rule.name: SCDO_getTotalCountReportesAprobadosByFilter
rule.description: Regla que cosulta el total al CDT cdo_reportes_aprobados
rule.definition:
#"_a-0000e8b9-0989-8000-e5fd-01ef9001ef90_2420859"( dataStoreEntity_dt: #"_a-0000e8d8-9b98-8000-e605-01ef9001ef90_2735521", queryFilter_any: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "idreporte", operator: "=", value: ri!idreporte, applyWhen: isnull(ri!idreporte) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "mercado", operator: "=", value: ri!mercado, applyWhen: isnull(ri!mercado) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "operacion", operator: "=", value: ri!operacion, applyWhen: isnull(ri!operacion) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "contrato", operator: "=", value: ri!contrato, applyWhen: isnull(ri!contrato) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "nombre", operator: "=", value: ri!nombre, applyWhen: isnull(ri!nombre) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "emisora", operator: "=", value: ri!emisora, applyWhen: isnull(ri!emisora) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "monto", operator: "=", value: ri!monto, applyWhen: isnull(ri!monto) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "promotor", operator: "=", value: ri!promotor, applyWhen: isnull(ri!promotor) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ccostos", operator: "=", value: ri!ccostos, applyWhen: isnull(ri!ccostos) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "usuario", operator: "=", value: ri!usuario, applyWhen: isnull(ri!usuario) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "fechacaptura", operator: "=", value: ri!fechacaptura, applyWhen: isnull(ri!fechacaptura) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "fechacaptura", operator: "between", value:{ ri!fechacaptura, ri!fechaaprobacion}, applyWhen: isnull(ri!fechacaptura) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "horacaptura", operator: "=", value: ri!horacaptura, applyWhen: isnull(ri!horacaptura) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "bitacora", operator: "=", value: ri!bitacora, applyWhen: isnull(ri!bitacora) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "riesgo", operator: "=", value: ri!riesgo, applyWhen: isnull(ri!riesgo) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "revisado", operator: "=", value: ri!revisado, applyWhen: isnull(ri!revisado) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "usuarioreviso", operator: "=", value: ri!usuarioreviso, applyWhen: isnull(ri!usuarioreviso) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ccreviso", operator: "=", value: ri!ccreviso, applyWhen: isnull(ri!ccreviso) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ip", operator: "=", value: ri!ip, applyWhen: isnull(ri!ip) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "fechareviso", operator: "=", value: ri!fechareviso, applyWhen: isnull(ri!fechareviso) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "observaciones", operator: "=", value: ri!observaciones, applyWhen: isnull(ri!observaciones) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "usuarioaprobo", operator: "=", value: ri!usuarioaprobo, applyWhen: isnull(ri!usuarioaprobo) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "fechaaprobacion", operator: "=", value: ri!fechaaprobacion, applyWhen: isnull(ri!fechaaprobacion) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "fechaaprobacion", operator: "between", value:{ ri!fechacaptura, ri!fechaaprobacion}, applyWhen: isnull(ri!fechaaprobacion) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "ipaprobacion", operator: "=", value: ri!ipaprobacion, applyWhen: isnull(ri!ipaprobacion) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "tipo", operator: "=", value: ri!tipo, applyWhen: isnull(ri!tipo) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "extra1", operator: "=", value: ri!extra1, applyWhen: isnull(ri!extra1) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "extra2", operator: "=", value: ri!extra2, applyWhen: isnull(ri!extra2) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "extra3", operator: "=", value: ri!extra3, applyWhen: isnull(ri!extra3) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "extra4", operator: "=", value: ri!extra4, applyWhen: isnull(ri!extra4) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "obligatorio", operator: "=", value: ri!obligatorio, applyWhen: isnull(ri!obligatorio) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "extra5", operator: "=", value: ri!extra5, applyWhen: isnull(ri!extra5) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "titulo", operator: "=", value: ri!titulo, applyWhen: isnull(ri!titulo) <> true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: "observaciones", operator: "=", value: ri!observaciones, applyWhen: isnull(ri!observaciones) <> true ),
}, selectionColumn_txt: ri!seleccionColumnas, pagingInfo_pi: if( isnull(ri!paginInfo), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(startIndex: 1, batchSize: 50), ri!paginInfo ), ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues_bool: true, fetchTotalCount_bool: true ).totalCount
